objects.text: • COMFORTABLE WEAR • STYLISH DESIGN • PREMIUM QUALITY

product_details.name: Nike Mens Court Legacy Running Shoes Nn-White/Black-Desert Ochre-Dh3162-100-9 UK
product_details.description: Designed for comfortable wear for sports and street style, NIKE is always fun to wear. Upgrade in style with a wide range from the world’s leading and much-loved sports brand, NIKE.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and stylish shoe advertisement with a theme of minimalistic sophistication. The design is centered around the product image ("product_image") placed prominently within a radial gradient circle that guides focus. A bold headline ("heading") sits at the top in a large black font, complemented by a gold-toned subheading ("subheading") that adds flair and hierarchy. The price tag ("price") is enclosed in a black circular badge with a gold border, positioned near the product for quick visibility. Supporting details are presented in a tagline section ("tagline") near the bottom, and a call-to-action button ("cta") over a black background ("cta_background") encourages immediate interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #212121
- Gold: #D4AF37
- Warm Gray: #E0E0E0 / #BDBDBD
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
product_color: This product image showcases a clean and stylish white sneaker with contrasting accent colors that pop effectively. The dominant color is a crisp white (#FFFFFF), representing purity and versatility, covering most of the shoe's surface. The black swoosh logo (#1A1A1A) and midsole line provide bold contrast and brand recognition. A mustard yellow strip (#D89E36) adds a touch of retro flair along the sole, drawing attention to the contours. A small dash of vibrant orange-red (#FF5733) on the tongue label subtly energizes the design. These colors are well-blended yet distinctly highlighted, offering a modern, minimal aesthetic—ideal for a youthful, sporty banner ad.
